name: Sword of Judgment
loreDescription: "If you're really innocent, the Goddess will save me from your sword." It could either be blood that falls or just red flower petals brighter than blood.

skillDescription.base: 10.0% chance to attack again with a Basic Attack if the target survives a single attack. Can only be activated once per turn.
skillDescription.max: 20.0% chance to attack again with a Basic Attack if the target survives a single attack. Can only be activated once per turn.
